abstract: Vows column on wedding of Bridget O'Neill and Justin Simons.
lead_paragraph: In their early twenties, the couple fostered 13 children over three years. Now they are on to the next chapter.

headline.main: Bridget O’Neill and Justin Simons: A Couple Fostering Love (and Children)
headline.print_headline: Fostering a Love That Transcends the Couple

snippet: In their early twenties, the couple fostered 13 children over three years. Now they are on to the next chapter.
